rows.label: tlk70000054_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks to your efforts, the king
granted the resistance army
official military status in Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000054_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Now we can get on with forging
closer connections with the army.

rows.label: tlk70000054_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Until now, we were still sort
of looked down on as this
ragtag band of loose cannons.

rows.label: tlk70000054_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But now we can hold our heads
high and bear the resistance
army moniker proudly!
